text: Edmond Baraffe (19 October 1942 - 19 April 2020) was a French professional football striker and manager. He was born in Annoeulin, France. He played for the national team from 1964 to 1966. He also played for Toulouse. He managed Le Touquet from 1985 to 1989. Baraffe died on 19 April 2020, aged 77.Edmond Baraffe, ancien entraîneur du Touquet, est décédé ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French footballers Category:Footballers from Nord Category:French football managers Category:France at the 1966 FIFA World Cup
title: Edmond Baraffe
